name: Pork Chop and Potato Bake
ingredients: 6 Pork Chops 1 (24oz) pkg. frozen hash brown potatoes (thawed)
1 can cream of celery soup 1 C shredded cheddar cheese
1/2 C milk 1 (2.8oz) can of durkee french fried onions
1/2 C sour cream oil for browning
1/2 C of cheese and 1/2 can of french fried onions. Spoon mixture into 9x13 inch baking dish. Arrange pork chops over
5 minutes longer. (note: I add more cheese than it calls for but add to your liking.
steps: Brown chops in lightly greased skillet; set aside. Combine soup, milk, sour cream, and pepper. Stir in thawed potatoes,
potatoes. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Top with remaining cheese and onions. Bake, uncovered for
